metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48052 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Missing SSL certificate validation in HTTPie v3.2.2 allows attackers to eavesdrop on communications between the host and server via a man-in-the-middle attack.

criterions.comment: httpie: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
